headline: Did Strong Results and New Acquisitions Just Shift Cadence Design Systems' (CDNS) Investment Narrative?
summary: Cadence Design Systems reported third-quarter 2025 results, surpassing analyst expectations with revenue of US$1.34 billion and net income of US$287.12 million, and raised its full-year outlook to reflect approximately 14% year-over-year revenue growth. Alongside strong demand across its business segments, recent acquisitions such as Arm Artisan foundation IP and the planned purchase of Hexagon’s D&E business signal Cadence's intent to strengthen its technology portfolio and market...

headline: Cadence Design Systems (CDNS): Slowing Margins Challenge Bullish Growth Narratives Despite Elevated Valuation
summary: Cadence Design Systems (CDNS) reported annual earnings growth of 9.3% over the past five years, with future earnings forecast to accelerate to 17.2% per year. This is expected to outpace the broader US market’s projected 15.6% annual growth. Revenue is also set to rise at 10.4% per year compared to the US market’s 10.1%, even as net profit margins slipped to 20.4% from last year’s 23.9% and most recent annual earnings rose just 2.1%, trailing the longer-term average. These figures spotlight a...
